Player History
Traded from Philadelphia to Los Angeles (N) on 4/1/1965 (Going to LAN: CF A. Phillips, P W. Granger, P P. Edmondson, P J. James. Going to PHI: P S. Koufax, P P. Richert, SS M. Wills)...
Had first career hit on 8/6/1966, off Dave Giusti (HOU)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/8/1966, off Jim Palmer (HOU)...

Hit 3 homeruns against Pittsburgh, driving in 3 runs on 4/11/1970...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1970, hitting .520 with 7 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1970, hitting .279 with 13 HR, 21 RBI...
Was selected to the 1970 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1971, hitting .458 with 7 HR, 15 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1971, hitting .279 with 13 HR, 33 RBI...
Was selected to the 1971 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1971...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1972, hitting .324 with 11 HR, 18 RBI...
